price: Hwε nso na wanfrε awurade foforᴐ bi anka Nyankopͻn ho; awurade biara nni hͻ ka Ne ho. Adeε biara bɛwu anaa εbεsεe afri hͻ, gyesε N’animuonyam (nko ara na εbεka). Ɔno na atemmuo no wͻ no, na Ne hͻ na mobεsan akͻ.
arabic: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ كُلُّ شَيۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجۡهَهُۥۚ لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā tadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara lā ilāha illā huwa kullu shayin hālikun illā wajhahu lahu al-ḥuk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
